1:
--------------------
<Text: The Hunting Party Tour:  It was launched in support of Linkin Park's sixth studio album, "The Hunting Party" (2014).>
Triplets:<The Hunting Party Tour
2:
--------------------
<Text: The Hunting Party Tour:  The tour was partially announced in May 2014 through a teaser released after the release of trailer of a co-headlined tour "Carnivores Tour" by Linkin Park and Thirty Seconds to Mars.>
Triplets:<The Hunting Party Tour
4:
--------------------
Text: The Hunting Party Tour:  Its first leg under the name "European Tour" began on May 30, 2014, in Lisboa, Portugal, and ended on June 14 in Castle Donington, England, where they played "Hybrid Theory" as a whole album.
